review: Over all, I like the device. It takes a while for the voice command to understand the speech. There are, however, a disappointment with the remote control . There is no ON/Off switch. With no ability to control the power, the batteries deplete faster. I had the problem with my Roku remote. If Amazon makes the change, I will put a Fire TV on each of my TVs.With this I will address problems with Prime. If I start to watch a TV series in Prime and it goes to the next season, there is no indication whether I am still in Prime or your charging me for the next season. I also noted that you are charging for TV series that I can get free with other providers. I would prefer to get my content from one provider and not have to switch to another. Since I have cut the cord, it would be nice to have access to the HBO, Showtime channels . If the price was right, I would agree to a monthly fee.

review: I couldn't be happier with the purchase of my FireTV system. I have movies, games, and apps for days. When I had cable I always complained that I was paying for channels that I didn't even watch. Now, I watch what I want to watch when I want to watch it. Add the games and apps that are available out of the box or post download and you've got yourself one extremely capable entertainment unit.
